::: {.Exercise data-latex=""}

Ecrivez l'expression de la constante d'équilibre pour les réactions suivantes.


1. $\ce{ A + 2 B <=> C + D}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
2. $\ce{2 C <=> E}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
3. $\ce{A + E <=> 2 D}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
4. $\ce{2 NO + O2 <=> 2 NO2}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
5. $\ce{N2O4 <=> 2 NO2}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
6. $\ce{2 SO2 + O2 <=> 2 SO3}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
7. $\ce{Fe^{3+} + SCN^{-} <=> Fe(SCN)^{2+}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}

:::

::: {.Answer data-latex=""}

1. $$ K = \frac{|\ce{C}| \cdot |\ce{D}|}{|\ce{A}| \cdot |\ce{B}|^2} $$
2. $$ K = \frac{|\ce{E}|}{|\ce{C}|^2} $$
3. $$ K = \frac{|\ce{D}|^2}{|\ce{A}| \cdot |\ce{E}|} $$
4. $$ K = \frac{|\ce{NO2}|^2}{|\ce{NO}|^2 \cdot |\ce{O2}|} $$
5. $$ K = \frac{|\ce{NO2}|^2}{|\ce{N2O4}|} $$
6. $$ K = \frac{|\ce{SO3}|^2}{|\ce{SO2}|^2 \cdot |\ce{O2}|} $$
7. $$ K = \frac{|\ce{Fe(SCN)^{2+}}|}{|\ce{Fe^{3+}}| \cdot |\ce{SCN^-}|} $$

:::
